casebody.data:
Christopher J. CHRISTIE, Governor of New Jersey, et al., petitioners,
v.
NATIONAL COLLEGIATE ATHLETIC ASSOCIATION, et al. No. 16-476. Supreme Court of the United States June 27, 2017.

*2328Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit granted. The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
